Class Edge

java.lang.Object
algochoochoo.graph.Edge
public class Edge extends Object
(Literally) A connection between two stops
Author:
Bilal Vandenberge

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    Edge(Node source, Node target, int distance)

    Construct a new Edge object

    • Edge

      public Edge(TripElement first, TripElement second, Map<String,Node> V, Trip t)
      Construct a new Edge object
      Parameters:
      first - The first element
      second - The second element
      V - The vertices of the graph
      t - The trip

    • Edge

      public Edge(Node source, Node target, int distance)
      Construct a new Edge object representing a transfer
      Parameters:
      source - The source node of the footpath
      target - The target node of the footpath
      distance - the distance between the two nodes (in meters)
